title: Type trends discussed at CreativePro.com
content:
Just to let you know about a recent article by John D. Berry on current type trends at CreativePro.com.   
   
If you haven't already, you can read it here:   
 [http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/17399.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132119/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/17399.html)   
   
It is interesting, although he's speaking in very general terms.   
   
If you want to express any of your thoughts about it, I'm always interested in your opinions.   
   
Ciao   
   
Paolo
author: paolo
